standard.name: cat
standard.desc: Reads data from a file and give their content as output.

standard.name: cp
standard.desc: Copy one or more files to another location.

standard.name: grep
standard.desc: Search files for lines that match a given pattern.

standard.name: more
standard.desc: Display output one screen at a time.

standard.name: mv
standard.desc: Move or rename files or directories.

standard.name: date
standard.desc: Display or change the date & time.

unique.name: who
unique.desc: Print all usernames currently logged in.

unique.name: kill
unique.desc: Kill a process by specifying its PID.

unique.name: diff
unique.desc: Display the differences between two files.

standard.name: type
standard.desc: Display the contents of a text file.

standard.name: copy
standard.desc: Copy one or more files to another location.

standard.name: find
standard.desc: Search for a text string in a file.

standard.name: dir
standard.desc: Display a list of files and folders.

standard.name: more
standard.desc: Display output, one screen at a time.

standard.name: date
standard.desc: Display or change the date & time.

standard.name: exit
standard.desc: Quit the current script/routine and set an errorlevel.

unique.name: ver
unique.desc: Displays the operating system version information.

unique.name: title
unique.desc: Set the window title for a CMD.EXE session.

unique.name: pause
unique.desc: Suspend processing of a batch file and display a message.

unique.name: call
unique.desc: Call one batch program from another.
